problem.title: Carbon accounting stays on "assumptions"
problem.point1: Different teams use different coefficients; results are inconsistent.
problem.point2: Idle consumption is ignored; real kWh is missed.
problem.point3: Report generation is manual; customer/audit requests are delayed.

solution.title: Standardized results with machine + material + time
solution.point1: Parameter-based model: material and machine profiles.
solution.point3: Actionable output: format ready for quote/report workflows.
